title: Identify
text: We are looking for how many gallons of gas each container can hold.

title: First equation

title: Second equation
text: Since the big container can hold ten gallons less than twice the small container, we can write the second equation as $$b=2s-10$$

title: Solve

title: Answer
text: Therefore, the small container holds $$20$$ gallons while the big container holds $$30$$.
